p: Lessons from the previous coronavirus and influenza epidemics suggest that viral infections can exacerbate a preexisting HF, with multiple studies showing an increase in HF re-hospitalization during influenza-like illness seasons [ 8]. With the more aggressive COVID-19 infection, HF patients are at a considerable higher risk of acute exacerbations, and multiple mechanisms may be responsible for triggering and aggravating this process (Fig.Â 1).
